data.text: It's a great PDF document scanner but otherwise the ads are overly annoying, I have to watch and wait 30 seconds for a stupid clip that cannot be skipped just to continue doing what I was doing with the documents. It's ridiculous and a waste of time. Why can't the ad be short like 5 or 10 seconds? Or at least none to begin with?

data.text: So far my information is safe and secure, while not being intruded by the unwanted advertising, and(or) personal information sharing. So far, PDF reader(basics) is a free service, more versitile, and easy to convert documents from other apps(eg., banks, microsoft, windows, outlook, etc,.); and I have yet to transverse platforms, such as copying my home computer docs.(AKA, pdf or ms document formats) . So far so good, but we shall see if this app can continue offering these benifits & options.üëç

Dude the advertising is dumb. Gets in the way. After every file I opened, I had to watch a clip or click the X in the top corner which somehow most of the time took me to the advertisement webpage! {Instead of simply X` ing out like it should. I'd have to click back a few times just to try click the X again... JUST TO GET BACK TO MY DOCUMENT I was just viewing, or to folder where I was simply just trying to view the files and find which one I needed}. Tedious & def not worth ad free paid version

data.text: Great PDF Reader! You can highlight, copy the text, rename the file, etc. The menu is clean, organized, and easy to manipulate files in. I was just looking to highlight text in my pdfs, so this meets my needs fine. Please note there is a brief ad when switching files and a banner ad when viewing a file. Thanks to the team/developer for making this absolutely free!

data.text: Sorry, I am not willing to sit through a 3-minute unskippable misleading ad for a game I've seen a million times just to open a PDF that my wife sent me. (In response to developer and another user) I totally get that ads are a source of revenue. I'm not opposed to them at all. But when the ad is literally three minutes long, cannot be skipped without closing the app, and is the very first thing I see when I launch it for the first time, that doesn't leave a good impression at all.
data.replyText: Hi Matt, I apologize for the inconvenience. Your feedback is valuable to us. We understand your concern about the ad experience, and we're actively working on optimizing it. Thank you for your understanding, and we appreciate your patience. If you have any further suggestions or concerns, feel free to share them with us.üôèüöÄ

data.text: This app puts you through so much before ever getting to use it. Deceptively similar looking pages appear one right after the other that have nothing to do with the downloaded app. And it is not as simple as you might think to shut these ad windows that keep appearing. Clearly the ads are designed to confuse you into thinking they are the App you downloaded when they are not. Way too many pdf apps available that don't put you through all these unnecessary hoops. I promptly uninstalled.
data.replyText: Hi J, sorry for the inconvenience. We will improve our advertising strategy to minimize interference with your use. In order to continue developing this free app, we need the meager ad revenue to keep the team running.‚ú® Thank you for your understanding.‚ù§Ô∏è

data.text: Most predatory and aggressive add pop-ups I've ever experienced! The app is nearly unusable!!! Edit: I tried to be patient with it, but found it unusable. Besides the excessive and greedy ad pop-ups, there are other issues, like copying text that ends up being pasted in left-align format. Horrible user experience. Uninstalling!

data.text: I am quite pleased with this app. Its designed for even the individual with minimal technology experience. It has performed each and every way I've used it. Yes there are ads however, you're not required to sit through the entire advertisement before getting to your document. You're able to skip the ad immediately and being free makes it that much more worthy! Awesome app. Definitely recommend!

The app is easy to use and it stores your information well. I would give it 5 stars but I recently learned when you get a new phone, whatever was on the PDF reader doesn't transfer to your new phone. Even if you use the same email as you did on your old phone. I was a little disappointed to see all my files that I had saved for tax years and other important information was gone, when I opened the app on my new phone. This should be fixed and then it would be a 5 star ‚≠ê app
data.replyText: Hi Jazman, thank you for bringing this to our attention!üòä We understand the importance of having your files transferred seamlessly to a new device. We'll prioritize the development of a cloud backup feature to address this issue.üåü We will keep you updated if there is a new version regarding this.

data.text: It is very slow when it comes to loading and if you download a book and open the book first with it.the file will disappear from the internal storage and you won't be able to view the file with another reader.i only still have it because if it goes, my books also go.so i rate it one star üåü
data.replyText: Hi Samuel, sorry for the inconvenience. To save a file, please download it first before opening it.‚ú® When you open a file with our app, the file is just a cache and is not saved in your phone. So it can't be found in your internal storage and may be cleaned up when you clean your phone. Hope this helps.

Thank you for your understanding!‚ù§Ô∏è

data.text: I love to easy to use but if you pay for the subscription is better because if not you get lots of adds before downloading anything. But is super easy
Nice App. I love the vertical arrangement of my files. But it will be perfect if the Ads is not included.
data.replyText: Hi Mary, thanks for downloading us and sorry for the ads. Our app is free, so we need to keep the team running by advertising. We will improve in the future and try to find ways to keep it from interfering.ü•∞ Have a beautiful day!‚ù§Ô∏è

data.text: It shows the documents. But I don't understand how to open quicker, it goes through a long selection process.
Too many damn ads before it even opens then it blocks your entire screen so you can't use your android bottom buttons to exit and go back home.
data.replyText: Hi dear user, we are sorry for the ads. You can swipe up from the bottom of your phone to reveal the back button. We will improve our strategy and reduce ads to deliver a better product experience. We rely on revenue from ads to continue offering this app for free. Thank you for your understanding.üôè Have a wonderful day!üåπ

data.text: The graphics and the features are amazing I like the app but one thing that you can change is that remove all the ads

I never thought that this app will be that much useful for students who are going through examinations at the time you don't find your files by marking it we can find those files Yes ,it is very useful app...
It's a very good PDF app that you can rely on when it comes to documenting your online books. Your friends can actually go for it.
Great source of entertainment and also a helpful app.Advertisement could be a little less but anyway it's worth downloading.
Overtaking my phone with adds even befor starting the app. As yet I am unable to start it despite many attempts to do so. Surprised that the app has such a rating. I am going to delete it ASP.
data.replyText: Hi moaal, sorry for the inconvenience. We will improve our advertising strategy to minimize interference with your use. To continue developing this free app, we rely on meager ad revenue to keep the team running.‚ú® Thank you for your understanding.‚ù§Ô∏è

data.text: My friend we're trying to print out a document from her phone it didn't work until we tried the PDF reader. Then it worked great.
I find the app extremely useful and easy to use. It saves me a lot of time & all of my documents are very secure.
Real helpful I am able to collaborate using the app and edit.! Its free so I can convert my documents from my laptop to my phone and get it converted... Its real simple and user friendly!
The ai feature allows for job applications, with the repeative stuff all done for you. It even helped me complete my resume!
Excellent but too much ads,at times at the hour of midnight some ads will just makes unexpected noise when you are busy search through PDF
data.replyText: Hi John, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Since our app is free, we rely on ads to support its development. We're committed to enhancing your experience and will strive to improve our ad strategy to make it less intrusive. Thank you for your patience and understanding.üíñ

data.text: It's awesome, I am 59 years old all this technology is crazy, but I need to save important documents and a friend requested is app. Thanks

In the starting the app was working good but after that when I opened any pdf or document it doesn't show me the way original it is. The font get's mixed up and I am not able see the work in the pdf. And too many add but the one star is because beside this it works well offline.
data.replyText: Hi Samiksha, sorry for the ads.‚ù§Ô∏è We'll improve our strategy to minimize bother. If possible, could you please send us the file that the font gets mixed up to pdfreaderappfeedback@gmail.com? We'll help you find the issue.üòä Your files will remain strictly confidential. Thank you.

data.text: Helpful and easy to use and comes up really clear when casting content to my 50" Vizio flatscreen tv on the wall. This feature also helps me to read the darn small print that companies really don't want us older folks to be able to read. Yes, I do take the time to read all that small print stuff.

In-between right now, still switching permissions and getting everything setup and trying to make sure I have a good understanding of the changes, all together everything is looking like it's it's making things easier for me and that's always a good thing... üëç

Insane amount of publicity. Really confusing, it took me to another site to install other apps. I mean I had never seen more publicity in an app. I wanted to save time by not login into my Adobe creative cloud account, but it was useless, it took me more time anyway. Already uninstalled it. Sadly, I do not recommend this app.
data.replyText: Hi Alfredo, we are so sorry for the ads.‚ù§Ô∏è You don't need to log into any account and can click the x to close this ad. We'll optimize the display so that the ads do not bother you as much as possible. Since the app is free, we need to show ads to keep the team surviving. Hope you can understand.üåπ

data.text: You are very good, it has made my work very easy in study and PDF also shows the ghost which helped me a lot in reading. Thank you PDF Reader.
data.replyText: Hi Ankita, thanks for your feedback.üòä We will continue working hard. And dear friend, could you give us a 5-star rating, if possible? This will greatly motivate us to do better. If you have any suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact us. Best regards!üåπ
